description technical detail:
ViewSonic Black 23" 5ms (GTG) Widescreen LED Backlight LCD Monitor
The ViewSonic VA2349s is a high-performance 23" wide-angle display with SuperClear IPS technology that delivers true color performance and consistent image quality. With Full HD 1080p resolution, 20M:1 mega dynamic contrast ratio, this up-market display offers a stunning visual experience for home and office. It combines function and form with an attractive glossy finish and slim bezel design, as well as VGA and DVI inputs for PC or laptop connections. Plus, with an integrated power-saving Eco mode and ENERGY STAR certification, this energy-efficient display has a lower total cost of ownership.
